title: Life Simulation Game Music Pack
description: Loopable instrumental music tracks for farming or life simulators, or light-themed rpgs or mmorpgs
longDescription:
10 seamlessly loopable instrumental tracks (and 2 additional tracks) spanning a variety of tempos, moods, and genres; designed for light-themed RPGs, MMORPGS, and life simulators. 42 minutes in total. If you're creating a farming simulator or life simulator this pack is perfect for your game! You will find all kinds of moods in here: Seasonal themes, fast and slow tempos, world music, orchestral styles; music boxes, tribal drums, flutes and bells, and lots of chordophones like guitar, banjo, mandolin and so much more!


You can listen to the music pack in full before purchase here:

https://soundcloud.com/aleksis_tristan_shaw/sets/life-simulation-game
